app.title: BenefitFinder
app.subtitle: Find Your Government Benefits
app.description: A privacy-preserving tool to help you discover government benefits you may be eligible for.

questionnaire.title: Eligibility Questionnaire
questionnaire.subtitle: Answer questions to find out which benefits you may qualify for

results.subtitle: Based on your answers, here are the benefits you may be eligible for
results.noResults: No benefits found matching your criteria

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information Needed
additionalInfo.message: You may qualify for some programs, but we need more information to determine eligibility. Review the program details below and contact the program office for assistance.

noResults.title: No Results Available
noResults.description: Complete the eligibility questionnaire to see which government benefit programs you may qualify for.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your privacy is our priority. All data processing happens locally on your device.
privacy.encryption: Your data is protected with strong encryption to keep your information secure.
privacy.localStorage: Works completely offline - no internet required for your assessment.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.

errors.offline: You are currently offline. Some features may not be available.

descriptions.medicaid: Health coverage for low-income individuals and families
descriptions.snap: SNAP helps low-income individuals and families buy food
descriptions.wic: Provides nutrition assistance to pregnant women, new mothers, and young children

welcome.title: Welcome to BenefitFinder!
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started. This tool helps you discover government benefits you may be eligible for, all while keeping your information private and secure.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected
privacy.content: All your information stays on your device. We don't collect, store, or share your personal data with anyone. Your privacy is our top priority.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.content: BenefitFinder works completely offline. No internet connection needed after the initial load. Your data never leaves your device.

encryption.title: Encrypted Storage
encryption.content: Your information is encrypted using military-grade AES-256 encryption. Even if someone accesses your device, your data remains secure.

startButton.title: Ready to Start?
startButton.content: Click the 'Start Assessment' button to begin the questionnaire. It takes about 5-10 minutes to complete and will help us determine which benefits you may qualify for.

overview.title: Your Privacy is Protected
overview.description: BenefitFinder is designed with privacy-first principles. Your personal information never leaves your device and is encrypted at all times.
overview.localProcessingDesc: All eligibility calculations happen on your device
overview.noTrackingDesc: We don't track your browsing or collect analytics
overview.encryptedStorageDesc: Your data is encrypted with AES-256-GCM
overview.offlineFirstDesc: Works completely offline after initial load

data.title: What Data We Handle
data.description: We only process the information you provide to determine your benefit eligibility. No personal identifiers are collected or stored.
data.householdInfo: Household size, income, and basic demographics
data.personalIdentifiers: Names, addresses, SSNs, or other personal identifiers
data.browsingHistory: Your browsing history or other websites you visit
data.analytics: Usage analytics, tracking pixels, or behavioral data

security.title: How We Protect Your Data
security.description: Multiple layers of security protect your information from unauthorized access.
security.encryptionDesc: Your data is encrypted using AES-256-GCM, the same encryption standard used by banks and government agencies.
security.localStorageDesc: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB with RxDB for secure, encrypted storage.
security.noServersDesc: No data is sent to external servers. Everything happens on your device.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have complete control over your data and can access, export, or delete it at any time.
rights.deleteDataDesc: You can delete all your stored data at any time. This action cannot be undone.
rights.exportDataDesc: Export your eligibility results and data for your own records.
rights.viewDataDesc: All your data is stored locally and accessible through the app interface.

quickstart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickstart.subtitle: Get started in just a few minutes

welcome.title: Welcome to BenefitFinder!
welcome.content: This tool helps you discover government benefits you may be eligible for. We'll guide you through a simple questionnaire to find the best benefits for your situation.

privacy.title: Your Privacy is Protected
privacy.content: All your information stays on your device. We don't collect, store, or share your personal data. Your privacy is our top priority.

questionnaire.title: The Questionnaire
questionnaire.content: We'll ask you about your household size, income, and other factors that determine benefit eligibility. This takes about 5-10 minutes.

results.title: Your Results
results.content: You'll get personalized results showing which benefits you qualify for, required documents, and next steps to apply.

nextSteps.title: Ready to Start?
nextSteps.content: You're all set! The assessment is quick, private, and will help you discover benefits you may not know you're eligible for.

welcome.personalizedResults: Detailed results for each benefit program
welcome.nextSteps: Clear next steps and required documents

results.eligibilityStatus: Clear eligibility status for each program

nextSteps.description: The assessment is designed to be quick and easy. You can save your progress and return later if needed.
